summary: This mod fixes the "HairMaleNord04" mesh, by preventing it showing through helmets and other headgear.
descriptionHtml:
[b]The [/b][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?][b]Unofficial Patch[/b][/url] fixes this issue from v3.0.1 (2016-01-30)[/b]


This mod fixes the "HairMaleNord04" hair model, by preventing it showing through helmets and other headgear.

Besides the hair fix, the mod also fixes a bandit preset that is used quite a lot throughout skyrim, that uses theÂ "HairMaleNord04" hair model.


Just extract the contents of the file into your Skyrim folder.


The mod contains these two files:

data\meshes\actors\character\character assets\hair\male\hairline04.nif
data\meshes\actors\character\facegendata\facegeom\skyrim.esm\0001bcd8.nif


Many, many thanks to the people behind Nifskope and FOMM's BSA Browser.
author: trold
